content.html: I love using work profile on my Android phone. Brilliant way to separate work and personal accounts. Buuuuttttt.... Is there any way to automate *when* a work account activates or deactivates? I'd like mine to auto switch off at 18:00.
content.value:
I love using work profile on my Android phone. Brilliant way to separate work and personal accounts.

Buuuuttttt.... Is there any way to automate *when* a work account activates or deactivates? I'd like mine to auto switch off at 18:00.
